member.name: M:ProviderService.Api.Controllers.ProviderController.Get(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an existing Provider by its identifier.

member.name: M:ProviderService.Api.Controllers.ProviderController.Post(ProviderService.Api.Models.Provider)
member.remarks:
Maybe you wanted to provide more detail for a sample request:
POST api/Provider/Post { "id": "1", "companyName": "SomeCompanyName", "alternateIdentifier": "3fa85f64-5717-4562-b3fc-2c963f66afa6", --GUID here... "isActive": true }
member.response: If the Provider provided as a parameter is null
If an exception is thrown while trying to execute the operation

member.name: M:ProviderService.Api.Controllers.ProviderController.Delete(System.Int32)
